sentences.en: A lot of contemporary music is virtually inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 许多当代音乐几乎难以理解。

sentences.en: He is inaccessible to his employees.
Heavy snow made the mountain village inaccessible to traffic.
sentences.cn: 大雪使车辆进不了这个小山村.

sentences.en: In this much - travelled world, there are still thousands of places which are inaccessible to tourists.
sentences.cn: 在这个旅游频繁的世界上, 仍有成千上万个游人足迹未至的地方.

sentences.en: In winter, the villages are inaccessible by road.
sentences.cn: 冬天时，进入这些村子的路很难走。

sentences.en: It could have landed in some inaccessible place, or could have crashed.
sentences.cn: 它可能是在人难以进去的地方降落了, 也可能是失事了.

sentences.en: Ninety-five per cent of its magnificent collection will remain inaccessible to the public.
sentences.cn: 其中95%的顶级收藏品仍不会向公众开放。

sentences.en: Parts of the forest are still dense and inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 森林的一些部分仍然很茂密，人迹罕至。

sentences.en: The papers were inaccessible to the public.
sentences.cn: 这些文件公众无法接触.

sentences.en: The plane crashed in a pretty inaccessible place.
sentences.cn: 飞机失事的地方人很难进去.

sentences.en: The top of Mount Everest is the most inaccessible place in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最难到达的地方.

sentences.en: The village is inaccessible by car in winter.
sentences.cn: 冬天时该村车子开不进去.

sentences.en: They live in a remote area, inaccessible except by car.
sentences.cn: 他们住在一处偏远地区，只能开车去。

sentences.en: This formerly inaccessible place can now be reached by road and rail.
sentences.cn: 这里过去是穷乡僻壤,现在铁路公路都畅通了.

sentences.en: This novel seems to me among the most inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 这本书对我来说是最难懂的小说之一.

sentences.en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

words.tran_cn: 难接近地；难得到地；难达成地
难达到；难接近；无法理解

trans.tran_cn: 达不到的，难见到的，不能接近的，无法理解的
